name: Pyxis
description:
Pyxis is a short metroidvania platformer. Heavily inspired by its predecessors, like Hollow Knight, Super Metroid and Super Mario, as well as games like Hyper Light Drifter and Out of This World.

---------------------------------------------------------------------

Pyxis é um curto metroidvania platformer. Bastante inspirado por seus predecessores, como Hollow Knight, Super Metroid e Super Mario, assim como jogos como Hyper Light Drifter e Out of This World.

---------------------------------------------------------------------

Programming, Art, Animation, Level & Enemy Design: Pedro "Amaro" Lacerda

Additional Player Programming: Lucas Castro

Spaceship Sprite: Julio "Sunrei23" Cesar

Additional Spritework & Animation: Luan "LeonArleand" Andrade

Beta Testers: Alexsandra Sandes, Paulo "Kalydan" Gomes, LeonArleand.
